node.text:
The leisure activities at The Raviz Kovalam range from spending your time being a beach-bum and simply sunbathing to swimming in the crystal clear waters, scuba diving, catamaran and speedboat cruising and other recreational activities to keep your entire family entertained.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
